Susan Barrows
Highly Effective Lead QA, Flexible, Team Player, and Eternal Optimist
July 21, 2014, Greg managed Susan directly

I managed Susan Finkel as a QA Analyst II at Apollo from 2007 to her departure in 2013. She was promoted to Senior QA Analyst in that period and led a small team of two to three QA Analysts brought on to assist Susan with the workload. Susan was a vital resource for my team. She was always open to learning new technologies and in her time with us she mastered scripting, SQL, back office processing through our workflow engine, and much more.Susan possessed a great work ethic and was one of the hardest workers on our team. She remained positive and focused on the goals of the organization even in the face of the many urgent or highly visible projects. Susan also assisted us in recruiting, interviewing and managing the QA Analysts on her team.Susan thrives on challenges, learning new technologies, and working in a dynamic team environment. I would strongly recommend her to anyone looking to grow or mature their QA or testing teams.

August 29, 2013, Greg managed Mark directly

Mark is a huge asset to any web development team looking to increase brand awareness and recognition, increase usability, or wanting someone to make the entire development team's efforts look good. Mark is a part of a dynamic team of professionals who consistently turn out world class applications for our Access & Identity Management team. He has developed logos, themes, and improved the reputation of an already solid team. Additionally, Mark is dependably enthusiastic, has a great sense of humor, humble, and increases overall team morale. I would hire Mark in a nanosecond if I worked anywhere else and consider our team fortunate to continue to work with him.
